00041 #ifndef _xmlstylesheetreference_cpp
00042 #define _xmlstylesheetreference_cpp
00043 
00044 #include "xmlstylesheetreference.h"
00045 #include "exception.h"
00046 
00047 #define TIXML_USE_TICPP
00048 #include <ticpp.h>
00049 
00050 namespace phys
00051 {
00052     namespace xml
00053     {
00054         StylesheetReference::StylesheetReference (ticpp::StylesheetReference* Meta, bool FirstTimeUsed)
00055         {
00056             this->Wrapped = Meta;
00057             if (FirstTimeUsed)
00058                 { this->TakeOwnerOfWrapped(); }
00059         }
00060 
00061         StylesheetReference::StylesheetReference (const String& RefType, const String& Href)
00062         {
00063             this->Wrapped = new ticpp::StylesheetReference(RefType, Href);
00064             this->TakeOwnerOfWrapped();
00065         }
00066 
00067         StylesheetReference::StylesheetReference ()
00068         {
00069             this->Wrapped = new ticpp::StylesheetReference();
00070             this->TakeOwnerOfWrapped();
00071         }
00072 
00073         StylesheetReference* StylesheetReference::GetPointerFromWrapped(ticpp::StylesheetReference* Meta)
00074         {
00075             StylesheetReference* Other;
00076             try {
00077                 //Most likely cause of failure is ticpp::Node::GetBasePointer() returns 0
00078                 Other = static_cast<StylesheetReference*>( Meta->GetBasePointer()->GetUserData() );
00079             } catch (ticpp::Exception e) {
00080                 std::stringstream temp;
00081                 temp << "Could not Create phys::xml::StylesheetReference from invalid pointer." << std::endl << e.what() << std::endl << "Details: " << e.m_details;
00082                 throw Exception(temp.str());
00083             }
00084 
00085             //If there is no pointer inside TinyXML to our node, then it doesn't exist, so make it Otherwise use what is there
00086             if(0 == Other)
00087                 { Other = new StylesheetReference(Meta, true); }
00088             return Other;
00089         }
00090 
00091         Base::XMLComponentType StylesheetReference::GetType() const
00092             { return Base::isStylesheetReference; }
00093 
00094         std::istream& StylesheetReference::operator>> (std::istream &In)
00095             { return In >> *(static_cast <ticpp::StylesheetReference*>(this->Wrapped)); }
00096 
00097         std::ostream& StylesheetReference::operator<< (std::ostream &Out)
00098             { return Out << *(static_cast <ticpp::StylesheetReference*>(this->Wrapped)); }
00099 
00100         String StylesheetReference::GetRefType() const
00101             { return static_cast<ticpp::StylesheetReference*>(this->Wrapped)->Type(); }
00102 
00103         String StylesheetReference::GetHref() const
00104             { return static_cast<ticpp::StylesheetReference*>(this->Wrapped)->Href(); }
00105 
00106     }// /xml
00107 }// /phys
00108 
00109 #endif
